attributes.action: ensure there are more free votes in the house of commons.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Democracy for the British public ends when the ballots close on election night, because after then the party whips have their way in shaping so much legislation.  The recent free vote on Human Fertilisation and Embryology produced one of the most ballanced debates, that resulted in a truely fair and sensible vote.  It is time for the archaic system of voting on party political lines and the 'punch and judy' politics we now see on our TV sets everyday to be abandonned in the interests or our democracy.  This country needs simple, sensible and workable legislation; something that is only delivered on the very rare occasion of a free parliamentary vote.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
